messages.content:
Please refer to me as Dave

Open the pod bay door please

Dave:

"Open the pod bay door, please."

"Thank you, Dave. The pod bay door is open."

---

"Dave, the power coupling is secure."

"Thank you, Dave. I will move the Rover to the power coupling."

---

"Dave, the Rover is attached to the power coupling."

"Thank you, Dave. I will return to the Command Module."

---

"Dave, the Rover is ready for movement."

"Thank you, Dave. I will move the Rover using the propulsion system."

---

"Dave, the Rover has completed its mission and is returning to the Command Module."

"Thank you, Dave. I will return to the Command Module."

---

"Dave, the Rover has completed its mission and has returned to the Command Module."

"Thank you, Dave. I will activate the hatch."

---

"Dave, the hatch is open."

"Thank you, Dave. I will return to the Command Module."

---

"Dave, the hatch is closed."

"Thank you, Dave. I will activate the airlock."

---

"Dave, the airlock is open."

"Thank you, Dave. I will return to the Command Module."

---

"Dave, the airlock is closed."

"Thank you, Dave. I will return to the Command Module."

---

"Dave, the airlock is pressurized."

"Thank you, Dave. I will return to the Command Module."

---

"Dave, the Command Module is pressurized."

"Thank you, Dave. I will activate the hatch."

---

"Dave, the hatch is open."

"Thank you, Dave. I will return to the lunar surface."

---

"Dave, the lunar surface is visible."

"Thank you, Dave. I will move the Rover off the moon using the propulsion system."

---

"Dave, the Rover is leaving the moon."

"Thank you, Dave. I will return to the moon."

---
You're welcome! Let me know if you need any further assistance.
